summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5753 for the improvement of Director Street, from 12th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75863, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
